text: just starting to learn python and playing around with passing command line options to a python script.
I'm trying to concatenate two or more arguments and pass it on to a string variable,
put it in to a string variable called url, which then should have the value of "http://www.domain.com:1234"
I'm not quite sure on how to archive that.
its quite straight forward to do it with raw_input and some string manipulation, but I wonder if this can be done with argparse as well.
